name: Imagine Boutique Owner
description:
Become the most fabulous boutique owner in town! Unleash your creativity
and design all types of gifts, including flower arrangements, plush toys
and jewelry. Please your customers by helping them choose the perfect
gift, then offer complimentary gift-wrapping to make it extra special
for them!

Features

• Run a Gift Boutique – Welcome customers to your boutique and assist
them in choosing the perfect gift for every occasion!
